rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Superbia tried to start
another war, didn't they?

rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0002
rows.name:
It seems Iira was the cause, so
I'm glad it ended in a truce.

rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0003
rows.name:
If it had become a real war,
Invidia would have likely
attacked Gula as well.

rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0004
rows.name:
It's conceivable that this
city, with its large base,
would have become a battlefield.

rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0005
rows.name:
...If that happened, this place
would be destroyed like my
ancestors' city, the White Chair.

rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0006
rows.name:
For Gulans, a truce is
very welcome indeed.
